actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Insular Affairs.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of the Interior should delegate general supervisory responsibility over the activities of the Government Comptroller of Guam to the Office of the Inspector General of the Department of the Interior.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of the Interior should delegate the immediate supervision of the government comptroller for Guam to the Office of the Inspector General within the Department of the Interior.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives that the Secretary of the Interior should delegate general supervisory responsibility over the activities of the Government Comptroller of Guam to the Office of the Inspector General of the Department of the Interior.
